title: Who Is Russell Henley’s Wife Teil Duncan? Relationship, Age, Job, Kids Explained
description: Russell Henley’s wife has recently become a hot topic of interest among fans. He is a professional golfer known for playing on the PGA Tour and has hit several milestones in his career, such as winning the Chiquita Classic in 2012 and becoming the first PGA Tour rookie to win his debut in 12 years […] The post Who Is Russell Henley’s Wife Teil Duncan? Relationship, Age, Job, Kids Explained appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Fans wondering who Russell Henley's wife is can learn more about her, her job, age, and the couple's children here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Russell Henley’s wife has recently become a hot topic of interest among fans. He is a professional golfer known for playing on the PGA Tour and has hit several milestones in his career, such as winning the Chiquita Classic in 2012 and becoming the first PGA Tour rookie to win his debut in 12 years in 2013. Recently, Henley added his victory at the Arnold Palmer Invitational via 1 stroke over Collin Morikawa, on his list of accomplishments. So, here’s all you need to know about the accomplished golfer’s wife, including her professional journey and their kids. What is Russell Henley’s wife’s name? Russell Henley’s wife’s name is Teil Duncan. Henley and Duncan, first crossed paths at the latter’s sister’s wedding, who was marrying one of the golfer’s childhood friends. Following an instant connection, they began dating soon after. Duncan and Henley eventually got engaged in 2014, and married one year later. She recently celebrated her husband’s Arnold Palmer Invitational win. In a video uploaded by PGA’s X account, the couple could be seen in a heartwarming embrace alongside their children. What is Teil Duncan’s age? Teil Duncan is 36 years old. Duncan was reportedly born in January 1988. This means the age difference between her and Russell Henley (born in 1989) is just 1 year. Duncan and Henley got married in October 2015, which was almost 10 years ago. At the time, the couple would have been 26 and 25, respectively. What is Teil Duncan’s job and what does she do for a living? Teil Duncan is a contemporary artist. Duncan’s painting expertise includes textiles, wallpapers, fine art, and prints. A BA Fine Art graduate from Auburn University, she frequently posts her artwork on her Instagram page, @teilart. Moreover, Duncan has her own website, where she sells various items like textiles, wallpapers, pillows, lampshades, still-life paintings, and various prints like animal prints, holiday prints, and landscape prints. Do Russell Henley and Teil Duncan have kids? Russell Henley and Teil Duncan have 3 children. The couple welcomed their son, Robert Russell Henley, in April 2018 and their first daughter, Ruth Teil Henley, in June 2019. Meanwhile, their younger daughter, Jane Edith Henley, was born in June 2022. The three make sporadic appearances on Duncan’s Instagram.
html:
Russell Henley’s wife has recently become a hot topic of interest among fans. He is a professional golfer known for playing on the PGA Tour and has hit several milestones in his career, such as winning the Chiquita Classic in 2012 and becoming the first PGA Tour rookie to win his debut in 12 years in 2013. Recently, Henley added his victory at the Arnold Palmer Invitational via 1 stroke over Collin Morikawa, on his list of accomplishments.

So, here’s all you need to know about the accomplished golfer’s wife, including her professional journey and their kids.

What is Russell Henley’s wife’s name?

Russell Henley’s wife’s name is Teil Duncan.

Henley and Duncan, first crossed paths at the latter’s sister’s wedding, who was marrying one of the golfer’s childhood friends. Following an instant connection, they began dating soon after.

Duncan and Henley eventually got engaged in 2014, and married one year later. She recently celebrated her husband’s Arnold Palmer Invitational win. In a video uploaded by PGA’s X account, the couple could be seen in a heartwarming embrace alongside their children.

What is Teil Duncan’s age?

Teil Duncan is 36 years old.

Duncan was reportedly born in January 1988. This means the age difference between her and Russell Henley (born in 1989) is just 1 year.

Duncan and Henley got married in October 2015, which was almost 10 years ago. At the time, the couple would have been 26 and 25, respectively.

What is Teil Duncan’s job and what does she do for a living?

Teil Duncan is a contemporary artist.

Duncan’s painting expertise includes textiles, wallpapers, fine art, and prints. A BA Fine Art graduate from Auburn University, she frequently posts her artwork on her Instagram page, @teilart.

Moreover, Duncan has her own website, where she sells various items like textiles, wallpapers, pillows, lampshades, still-life paintings, and various prints like animal prints, holiday prints, and landscape prints.

Do Russell Henley and Teil Duncan have kids?

Russell Henley and Teil Duncan have 3 children.

The couple welcomed their son, Robert Russell Henley, in April 2018 and their first daughter, Ruth Teil Henley, in June 2019. Meanwhile, their younger daughter, Jane Edith Henley, was born in June 2022. The three make sporadic appearances on Duncan’s Instagram.
